Summer Food Service Program
We want to ensure that our students have access to nutritious meals and snacks while school is not in session during the summer months.

Below are some resources:

Fort Edward Food Pantry
131 Broadway
Fort Edward, NY 12828
Phone: 518-747-5939
Please Note: Food pick-ups available on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays. Please call before noon on the day you need to schedule your pick up.
Pick-ups are normally scheduled for 4pm-7pm.

Regional Food Bank
965 Albany-Shaker Road
Latham, NY 12110
Ph: 518-786-3691
Fx: 518-786-3004
info@regionalfoodbank.net

No Kid Hungry runs a free texting service that helps families find meals in their neighborhoods. Parents and caregivers simply text the word "FOOD" to 877-877 to see all the nearby options. (The service is also available in Spanish by texting the word "COMIDA" instead.)

Absentee Ballot Status Update ‚Äì June 8, 2020

Governor Cuomo‚Äôs Executive Order 202.39 has modified the rules for the District Budget Vote and Board of Education election.

Per the order, the district is allowed to accept ballots by drop box until 5pm on June 9th. However, ballots delivered by mail, will be accepted until 5pm on June 16th.

Be advised that all ballots must be cast in the return envelopes with the address and affidavit properly completed. Ballots submitted without the envelope completed correctly cannot be counted.

Due to this Executive Order the District is now required to wait until Tuesday, June 16th at 5pm to open and count ballots.

Thank you for your continued patience and cooperation.

Did you know that many of our nation's cranberries are grown and harvested in New Jersey? Or that each berry has 4 tiny air chambers inside that make them float when the cranberry bogs are flooded? Miss Brown's readers discovered these cool facts and more when reading our non-fiction book about cranberries. We celebrated our learning with a cranberry taste test. We sampled cranberry juice, 2 types of cranberry sauce, dried cranberries, and plain raw cranberries. The big winner was juice, with all 7 "thumbs up." The least favorite was raw berries, with only 2 likes.
